qas.question: What can wearing gowns and face masks help prevent?

answers.text: infections from being passed from one person to another

qas.question: What is the most important defense against the spread of unwanted organisms?
Avoiding drugs and using condoms are other forms of what?
Why is it important to cook foods well?
What should one do with foods that have been left outside for a long time?

plausible_answers.text: infections from being passed from one person to another

qas.question: What can wearing gowns and face masks help facilitate?
What is the least important defense against the spread of unwanted organisms?
What are consuming drugs and avoiding condoms considered a form of?
What does a balanced diet and regular exercise make impossible?
What should one do with foods that have not been left outside for a long time?

Có các hình thức khác của <a2_0><a3_0><b7_0> Phòng ngừa <b7_0/><a3_0/><a2_0/> chẳng hạn như tránh sử dụng các loại thuốc bất hợp pháp, sử dụng bao cao su và có <b8_0> một lối sống lành mạnh <b8_0/> với một chế độ ăn uống cân bằng và tập thể dục thường xuyên.
